## HttpRequest.requestBlob() method

Fetch a blob object from remote.

**Signature:**

```typescript
requestBlob(url: string): Promise<Blob>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  url | string | The remote URL to fetch. |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;Blob&gt;

The fetch result.
